member.name: T:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Properties of the current RabbitMQ Service Model Version

member.name: T:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding
member.summary: A windows communication foundation binding over AMQP

member.name: M:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the RabbitMQBinding class initialized to use the Protocols.DefaultProtocol. The broker must be set before use.

member.name: M:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Uses the broker specified by the given hostname and port with Protocols.DefaultProtocol.
member.param: The hostname of the broker to connect to
The port of the broker to connect to

member.name: M:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,RabbitMQ.Client.IProtocol)
member.summary: Uses the broker and protocol specified
member.param: The hostname of the broker to connect to
The port of the broker to connect to

member.name: M:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,RabbitMQ.Client.IProtocol)
member.summary: Uses the broker, login and protocol specified
member.param: The hostname of the broker to connect to
The port of the broker to connect to
The broker username to connect with
The broker password to connect with
The largest allowable encoded message size

member.name: M:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.#ctor(RabbitMQ.Client.IProtocol)
member.summary: Uses the specified protocol. The broker must be set before use.

member.summary: Gets the scheme used by the binding, soap.amqp

member.summary: Gets the reliable session parameters for this binding instance

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.TransactionFlow
member.summary: Determines whether or not the TransactionFlowBindingElement will be added to the channel stack

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBinding.OneWayOnly
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the CompositeDuplex and ReliableSession binding elements are added to the channel stack.

member.name: T:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement
member.summary: Represents the configuration for a RabbitMQBinding.
member.remarks: This configuration element should be imported into the client and server configuration files to provide declarative configuration of a AMQP bound service.

member.name: M:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement Class initialized with values from the specified configuration.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement Class.

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.HostName
member.summary: Specifies the hostname of the broker that the binding should connect to.

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.Port
member.summary: Specifies the port of the broker that the binding should connect to.

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.OneWayOnly
member.summary: Specifies whether or not the CompositeDuplex and ReliableSession binding elements are added to the channel stack.

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.Password
member.summary: Password to use when authenticating with the broker

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.TransactionFlowEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether or not WS-AtomicTransactions are supported by the binding

member.summary: The username to use when authenticating with the broker

member.summary: Specifies the protocol version to use when communicating with the broker

member.summary: Specifies the maximum encoded message size

member.summary: Gets the protocol version specified by the current configuration

member.name: P:RabbitMQ.ServiceModel.RabbitMQBindingConfigurationElement.VirtualHost
